maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ...Испытание ты ищешь, испытание ты и получишь...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Patience has become rare in this world..
...This trial will test your focus and will...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ...Это испытание проверит твою сосредоточенность и волю...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Watch the pipe, as water fills up and flows out...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ...Наблюдай за трубой, как вода заполняет её и вытекает...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Speak to me again if you wish to begin the trial...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ...Поговори со мной снова, если хочешь начать испытание...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: Y-You think that bug will go away while we wait patiently?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: Т-Ты думаешь, что жук исчезнет, пока мы будем терпеливо ждать?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: Of course not. Why would it?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: Конечно нет. С чего бы это?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: ...Stand in the flower circle, still like a stone...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ...Встань в круг цветов и замри, как камень...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig:
...Wait patiently until it touches
the stone \c[3]12 times\c[0]...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: ...Терпеливо жди, пока она не коснётся камня \c[3]12 раз\c[0]...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.orig: Wait for the pipe to touch the stone \c[3]12 times\c[0], then hit the switch.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/548/se.text: Подождите, пока труба коснётся камня \c[3]12 раз\c[0], а затем нажмите переключатель.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.orig: ...You lost your patience and moved out of the circle...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.text: ...У тебя кончилось терпение, и ты вышла из круга...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.orig: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/578/se.text: ...Поговори со мной, чтобы вновь испытать своё терпение...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...Take this token as a sign of your victory...
...You lost patience and hit the switch too soon...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ...Ты потеряла терпение и нажала переключатель слишком рано...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...You lost focus and missed the right moment...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ...Ты потеряла концентрацию и пропустила нужный момент...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.orig: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/579/se.text: ...Поговори со мной, чтобы вновь испытать своё терпение...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This...\. This is boring.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Это...\. Это скучно.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This is so relaxing.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Это так расслабляет.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Oh, it's the Trial of Patience, I see...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ох, так это и есть Испытание терпения, понятно...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This... This can't be right!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Это... этого не может быть!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: This pipe is CHEATING!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Эта труба ЧИТЕРИТ!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: That pipe... that doesn't seem physically correct, does it?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Эта труба... она не похожа на физически правильную, не так ли?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Gosh, Water in CrossWorlds. Not gonna get over that.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Чёрт, вода в CrossWorlds. Не переживу этого.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Hush, Nerd!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Тише, Ботан!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: ...Wait...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: ...Подожди...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: They really had fun with that bamboo fountain, didn't they?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Они реально повеселились с этим бамбуковым фонтаном, тебе не кажется?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: By the way! I've found a way to add a counter to make your life easier, Lea!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Кстати! Я нашел способ добавить счётчик, чтобы упростить тебе жизнь, Лея!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Pipe Hit Count
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Счётчик ударов трубы

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: W...Wait... Damn, I made a mistake!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ст...Стой... Чёрт, я сделал ошибку!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Lea, please ignore the counter! It's wrong!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Лея, пожалуйста, игнорируй счётчик! Он неисправный!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Man, I remember how I saw a fountain like this in real life a long time ago.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Эх, я помню, как видела такой фонтан в реальной жизни давным-давно.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: How many years ago was it?\. \c[3]6\c[0]?\. Maybe even \c[3]8\c[0].
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Сколько лет назад это было?\. \c[3]6\c[0]?\. Может быть, даже \c[3]8\c[0].

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Anyway people kept throwing coins at it for good luck.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: В общем, люди бросали туда монеты на удачу.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: And there was this one guy that threw like...\. \c[3]10 coins\c[0] at it at once.\. The poor thing almost broke!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: И там был один парень, который бросил...\. \c[3]10 монет\c[0] сразу.\. Бедная штука чуть не сломалась!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: I heard stories of Seekers that managed to fail this challenge more than \c[3]8 times\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Я слышал истории об Искателях, которые умудрились провалить это испытание более \c[3]8 раз\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: That is ridiculous! Counting to \c[3]12\c[0] should be easy! It's barely more than \c[3]10\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Это нелепо! Считать до \c[3]12\c[0] довольно просто! Это лишь немногим больше \c[3]10\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Whyyyyyy?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Почемууууууу?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: What is it, Spheromancer Lea?\. Do you think counting to \c[3]10\c[0] is hard?\. What about \c[3]8\c[0]?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Что такое, сферомант Лея?\. Тебе кажется, что считать до \c[3]10\c[0] сложно?\. Как насчёт \c[3]8\c[0]?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Whyyyyyy?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Почемууууууу?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Ah sorry, I'm trying to remember what I still have to buy for dinner tonight.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ой, извини, я пытаюсь вспомнить, что мне нужно будет купить на ужин сегодня.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Gonna have to start cooking at \c[3]7\c[0] to be done in time.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Мне нужно начать готовить в \c[3]7\c[0], чтобы поспеть вовремя.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Wait!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Подожди!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Err... Did it tip \c[3]6\c[0] times now?\. Or was it \c[3]7\c[0], already?\. Dang it.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Ээээ.... Она ударила \c[3]6\c[0] раз?\. Или уже все \c[3]7\c[0]?\. Чёрт побери.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: I was distracted by the implausible water physics and forgot to count...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Я отвлёкся на неправдоподобную физику воды и сбился со счёта...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: So like...\. where are we now?\. \c[3]9\c[0]? \c[3]11\c[0]?\. Gosh, I messed up!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Так что...\. сколько уже сейчас?\. \c[3]9\c[0]? \c[3]11\c[0]?\. Боже, я сбился!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.orig: Whyyyy?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/587/se.text: Почемууу?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.orig: ...The water must flow naturally, no tampering allowed...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.text: ...Вода должна течь как заповедано природой, без постороннего вмешательства...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.orig: ...Talk to me again to test your patience once more...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/591/se.text: ...Поговори со мной, чтобы вновь испытать своё терпение...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/593/se.orig: Somebody heeelp!\. There are way too many of them!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: PLEASE WHY SO MANY BUGS AGAIN CAN I PLEASE HAVE A BREAK?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: ПОЖАЛУЙСТА, НУ ПОЧЕМУ ТАК МНОГО ЖУКОВ, МОЖНО МНЕ УЖЕ ОТДОХНУТЬ?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: This amount of opponents it's.... it's very unjust!!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Такое количество оппонентов - это.... это очень несправедливо!!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: How is it even possible to assemble so many enemies?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Как вообще можно собрать так много врагов?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: There really is no end to them, is there?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.text: Им и правда конца не видать, не так ли?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/606/se.orig: Just how many of those bugs are there?
Ahhhhh!\. Why won't they stop coming?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Now HERE's how you make an entrance!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: ВОТ как надо появляться!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: The cavalry's here!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Кавалерия прибыла!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Phew...\. I don't think I've ever seen so many beetles attacking at once!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Фух...\. Я не думаю, что когда-либо видел, чтобы так много жуков нападали одновременно!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Haha, you could say that again!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ха-ха, верно сказано!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Wait... it's you?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Стоп... это ты?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yup!\. Thanks again for the rescue!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Да!\. Снова спасибо за спасение!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: ...\. No problem...\. That was...\. how many times now?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: ...\.Без проблем...\. Это было...\. в который раз уже?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Dunno, I lost count!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Не знаю, я сбился со счёта!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Seriously, you really should be more careful about the kinds of battles you end up in.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Серьёзно, тебе следовало бы быть более осторожным насчёт сражений, в которые ты ввязываешься.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Make sure to prepare yourself,\. learn skills,\. upgrade your equipment...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Убедись, что подготовлен,\. выучи навыки,\. обнови экипировку...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I know!\. In fact, I just collected the last few items I needed for the gear I always wanted!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Я знаю!\. На самом деле, я только что собрал последние предметы, нужные мне для той экипировки, которую я всегда хотел!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Finally I can get rid of the Ba'kii Kum stuff...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Наконец-то я смогу избавиться от вещей из Ба'кии Кум...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: You...\. didn't upgrade your equipment for so long?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ты...\. не обновлял экипировку ТАК долго?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Haha, yeah...\. pretty much.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ха-ха, да...\. как-то так.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Why?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Почему?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I didn't want to waste money and items on equipment that I'd replace later on anyway, see?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Не хотел тратить деньги и предметы на экипировку, которую я всё равно потом бы сменил, понимаешь?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: That...\. I mean...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Это...\. Я имею в виду...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Just HOW did you even manage to get this far?!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: КАК тебе вообще удалось продвинуться так далеко?!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Well...\. you helping me out when I was in trouble certainly helped a lot!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ну...\. то, что вы выручали меня каждый раз, когда я был в беде, несомненно очень помогло!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: But like, the Gaia's Garden temples are solo instances, how did you...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Но, как бы, храмы Сада Гайи - это одиночные подземелья, как ты...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Faceroll it till you make it, right?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Умирал до тех пор, пока не прошёл.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Anyway, gotta get my new gear now!\. See you around!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: В любом случае, пришло время получить мою новую экипировку!\. Ещё увидимся!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: We're done!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Мы закончили!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Hi!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Привет!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Nice work!!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Отличная работа!!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: That was a lot of samurai bugs, huh?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ух, сколько было жуков-самураев, а?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yes, indeed.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Да, действительно.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: And our little Triblader-troublemaker looked happy...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: А наш проблемный триблейдер выглядел вполне счастливым...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yeah...\. that guy sure keeps us busy...
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Да...\. этот парень подкидывает нам работёнки...

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He does, doesn't he?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Вот уж точно.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: That's why I setup a notification for whenever he logs in!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Вот почему я настроила показ уведомлений на каждый раз, когда он заходит в игру!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's been surprisingly quiet today, so I lost track of his movements until, like three fights ago.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: От него было на удивление мало проблем сегодня, так что я даже потеряла его... до этих последних трёх сражений.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: But usually he gets into trouble minutes after he logs in!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Но обычно он попадает в беду через считанные минуты после захода в игру!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's helped me perfect my timing because he's so predictable!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Он помог мне отточить до совершенства время реагирования, потому что он так предсказуем!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: How many times have we saved him already?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Сколько раз мы уже спасли его?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Let me check!\. Hm...\. about 340 times now?\. Wow!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Дай мне проверить!\. Хм...\. уже около 340 раз?\. Вот это да!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Yeah, it's about time we stopped saving that one.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Да, пора нам перестать спасать его.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Aww, you think so?
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Оуу, ты так думаешь?

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's become way too careless, doesn't prepare for his battles at all.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Он стал слишком небрежным, совсем не готовится к битвам.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: He's relying on our help...\. way too much.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Он рассчитывает на нашу помощь...\. слишком сильно.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: We're here to rescue people in need...\. but people still should learn to fight for themselves.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Мы существуем ради того, чтобы выручать нуждающихся...\. но нуждающимся всё-таки стоит учиться постоять за себя.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Well, when you're right you're right...\. our first exception.\. Maybe I should design him a badge!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ну, ты как всегда прав...\. наше первое исключение.\. Может, мне стоит сделать для него особый значок!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Ooh!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: О!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Someone else needs help!\. And it's not that guy.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Кому-то ещё нужна помощь!\. И это не тот парень.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I'll take this one!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Я займусь этим!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: It was great meeting you, Lea!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Было приятно познакомиться, Лея!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Bye!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Пока!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Well that sure was something.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Да уж, это было что-то.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: [nods]
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: [кивает]

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: I think you've helped us more than enough.\. Thanks a lot!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Я думаю, что ты помогла нам более чем достаточно.\. Большое спасибо!

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: And of course, as promised, here's your reward.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: И конечно, как и было обещано, вот твоя награда.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Alright...\. I gotta go.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Ладно...\. Мне надо идти.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: You never know when someone might need our help...\. at exactly the right time.
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Никогда не знаешь, когда кому-либо может понадобиться твоя помощь...\. в самый последний момент.

maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.orig: Feel free to drop by at the headquarters whenever you like!
maps/forest/path-07.json/entities/607/se.text: Будем рады видеть тебя в нашем штабе в любое время!
